meanings.definition: A person who sells or deals in dry goods, chemicals, or dyes.
meanings.sent1: The drysalters at the store helped me find the perfect dye for my project.
meanings.sent2: The drysalters stocked a wide variety of dry goods for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The drysalters decided to have a colorful competition to see who could mix the best dye.
meanings.sent4: The drysalters' knowledge of chemicals was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the friendly drysalters who assisted me in choosing the right fabric dye.

meanings.definition: A business that sells dry goods, chemicals, or dyes.
meanings.sent1: The local drysalters is known for its high-quality dry goods selection.
meanings.sent2: I visited the drysalters to purchase some chemicals for my science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The drysalters' shop had a magical atmosphere with all the colorful dyes on display.
meanings.sent4: The drysalters' store was a treasure trove of useful items.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the drysalters' establishment felt like stepping into a world of endless possibilities.
